name: Dark Waters & Krayt Dragon Bones
Text: 'Deploy on Rancor Pit. May deploy a non-[Selective] ferocious creature here. During your battle phase, if you have no presence here, may relocate a captive from Audience Chamber to here. If opponent''s character here was just eaten, retrieve 3 Force.  If a creature here is lost, owner loses Force equal to half its printed deploy cost (round up).  Once per turn, if a creature here is about to draw destiny for ferocity, may instead use its destiny number. (Immune to Alter.)',
